metadata.Title: CVE-2021-45908 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in gif2apng 1.9. There is a stack-based buffer overflow involving a while loop. An attacker has little influence over the data written to the stack, making it unlikely that the flow of control can be subverted.

criterions.comment: gif2apng: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
